title: BimlFlex Integration Keys and Relationships
description: The Enterprise-Wide Business Key (EWBK) is a core concept in Data Vault modeling. It allows the modeler to focus on defining entities and relationships based on the business process focused keys, rather than the technical keys from the operational (source) system. This allows easier cross-system integration in the Data Vault.

frontMatter.title: BimlFlex Integration Keys and Relationships
frontMatter.summary: Data Vault management of integration keys, relationships, business keys, examples, and how to accelerate in the Data Vault Accelerator
